author: Joyce Rhim
description: A fine location for a nap. The table provided is higher than the seat of the chair so if used as a footrest, your legs may fall asleep. You may find yourself waking up to the sounds of people leaving and entering the area.

comfort.details: Not sure if it's comfy or if I'm just dead tired but I KNOCKED out

location.details: Very quiet, but right next to a door

other.details: Big windows and sunlight, close to home
